steps.label: Step
steps.title: Visit the Library
steps.description: Visit our library during operating hours to begin the membership process or can be 24-Hours online registration.

steps.label: Step
steps.title: Fill out an Application
steps.description: Fill out a library membership application form available at the library's front desk or online. You will need to provide proof of address and a valid ID.

steps.label: Step
steps.title: Receive Your Library Card
steps.description: Once your application is processed, you will receive your library card. This card allows you to borrow books and access library services.

steps.label: Step
steps.title: Explore the Library
steps.description: Take some time to explore the library's collections, facilities, and services. Our staff can assist you in finding materials of interest.

steps.label: Step
steps.title: Borrowing Books
steps.description: With your library card, you can borrow books and other materials. Simply bring the items you wish to borrow to the front desk, and our staff will assist you in the checkout process.

steps.label: fine
steps.title: Fees & Fines for Public
steps.description: Late return fines are charged for overdue materials to encourage timely returns and ensure fair access to library resources.

steps.label: Step
steps.title: Library Membership
steps.description: To access our member-only library services, you must first become a public library member as outlined in the previous section.

steps.label: Step
steps.title: Upgrade to Member Library Status
steps.description: Once you are a public library member, you can inquire about upgrading to member library status. This may involve additional fees or requirements.

steps.label: Step
steps.title: Access Member-Only Services
steps.description: With member library status, you gain access to specialized services, such as interlibrary loans, research databases, and extended borrowing periods.

steps.label: fine
steps.title: Fees & Fines for Member
steps.description: Late return fines are charged for overdue materials to encourage timely returns and ensure fair access to library resources.

steps.label: membership
steps.title: Membership
steps.description: Member library status may require an annual membership fee, which helps support the additional services and resources available exclusively to members.
